TopicTitle: Fine tuning a Cowboy Bebop "Red Tail" Flyable Replica - Stream starting in 10 minutes!

Articles.Content:
Watch here: [Avera9eJoe - Twitch](http://www.twitch.tv/avera9ejoe/)

I've been a fan of Couwboy Bebop for a good chunk of time now and I've began recreating replicas of the well known ships in KSP. 

My first work was the Swordfish II:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/1qr3O)

I hope you enjoy me fine tuning a flyable replica of the "Red Tail"...
